name: Backrooms Remastered
description:
Backrooms Remastered is a reworked version of IEP_Esy Backrooms game with new visuals, including vhs mode, high resolution textures, new effects and new/reworked sounds !

For now the game is only playable on Windows and require a decent computer to run it, other platforms like Linux will come in the future.

-Description-

Based on a creepypasta, the Backrooms brings a nostalgic feeling of being lost in endless piles of empty rooms with fluorescent lights at full hum-buzz. You have to find your way out, but of course, some "friends'' don't want you to leave. If you don't "wake up" in time, your nightmares will drown you.

-Credits-

This game is created by Ilia Esmaili Poor (IEP_Esy).

Remastered by MEGAgameBoy.

-Links-

If you like the game you can support the Backrooms The Lore Development here.
